definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The morning session of the seminar was not well attended.
sentences.chinese: 這個研討會的晨會出席狀況不甚理想。

sentences.english: The thermal therapy terminated after the terminal germ seminar.
sentences.chinese: 熱療在期末細菌研討會吿終止了。

sentences.english: He has also held seminars at Samra University of Oriental, Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他後來也在東方薩姆拉中醫藥大學舉行研討會。

sentences.english: Mr. Scott got sick and I have to attend the Speechmaker’s Symposium in his place.
sentences.chinese: Scott先生生病了，我要替他去參加研討會。

sentences.english: The seminar is a collaboration between the computer science and mathematics department.
sentences.chinese: 這個研討會是計算機系和數學系合作舉辦的。

sentences.english: I acted as one of the speakers in the Sino-Swedish Arbitration Seminar in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 作爲發言人之一，參加2006年中瑞仲裁研討會。

sentences.english: On the same day, the International Media Seminar on Peace in the Middle East opened in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 同日，中東和平問題國際媒體研討會在北京開幕。

sentences.english: I have no memory of the Friday seminar meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我不記得星期五研討會的情況了。

sentences.english: Can you suggest a place where we can have our next seminar?
sentences.chinese: 你能提出一個可供我們下一次研討會開會的場所嗎？

sentences.english: In this sense, this seminar could not have been timelier.
sentences.chinese: 從這個意義上講，這次研討會恰逢其時。

sentences.english: Integrated Pest Management In Oilseed Rape. International Symposium. 2006.
sentences.chinese: 油籽開發綜合性有害物管理，國際研討會，2006。

sentences.english: Over the weekend I’ve been in Fort Lauderdale as part of a performing arts seminar.
sentences.chinese: 整個週末，我都在羅德岱堡參加一個表演藝術研討會。

sentences.english: And this workshop was just the start.
sentences.chinese: 這個專題研討會只是個開始。

sentences.english: that we got a small, seminar-style class.
sentences.chinese: 我們能進行小型的研討會式的課程。

sentences.english: The validation workshop will be conducted once the Life Skills Package has been completed.
sentences.chinese: 在生活技能培訓包編篡完成後將會召開論證研討會。

sentences.english: A high-level round-table conference and two parallel seminars will be held during the two-day symposium.
sentences.chinese: 本次研討會設有高層圓桌會議和兩個平行研討會。

definition: to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
